0: Mr Jeffrey Charles Price Aerospace Science NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR pricej@msudenver.edu NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR CAMPUS BOX 030 NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR 303-556-2982 NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Personal Biography Statement Professor Jeffrey C. Price is a graduate of the Metropolitan State University of Denver and the lead author of Practical Aviation Security: Predicting and Preventing Future Threats (now in its second edition). He is considered one of the world's leading experts in aviation security, often called upon by CNN, ABC News, USAToday, the Associated Press and others to comment on aviation safety and security issues. He also served as an expert witness on the 9/11 case. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR A former US Coast Guard Officer, Jeff started his aviation career in airport operations at Denver’s previous airport, Stapleton International, then was the assistant security director at Denver International Airport when the airport opened in 1995. He then went on to become the Airport Director at Rocky Mountain Metropolitan Airport, Colorado’s 3rd busiest airport. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR He has authored several certification programs on aviation security and airport management, in addition to being a regular contributor to Aviation Security International magazine. He is the lead author of the American Association of Airport Executives (AAAE) Certified Member body of knowledge, which is the baseline program for becoming an Accredited Airport Executive. He also authored the AAAE Airport Certified Employee-Security program. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR He is a commercially certificated pilot and holds a Bachelors degree in Professional Pilot from MSU Denver, and a Masters in Curriculum and Instruction from Colorado Christian University. He is a Certified Homeland Security Level I through ABCHS, a Certified Protection Professional through ASIS and a Certified Member of AAAE. He has also just been contracted by his publisher to write another textbook titled: Airport Operations, Safety and Emergency Management. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Current Projects Airport Operations, Safety and Emergency Management - a new textbook that will publish in 2016.
